official_title: Resolution authorizing W. Donald Gray, an employee of the Committee on Commerce, to appear and give testimony by deposition in the case of Lyons v. Policeman's Association of the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Authorizes W. Donald Gray, an employee of the Committee on Commerce, to appear and give testimony by deposition in the case of Lyons v. Policeman's Association of the District of Columbia.
